The teleportal has been repaired, and you have gone to the Ice Throne with your comrades.

Dakuryon has built a throne in his honor in an icy place where he keeps his experiment.

He cruelly turned Hasmina's sister into a monster, which ultimately led to her death.

Some time has passed.

The glyph should have been fully deciphered by now, right?

Let's head to the Mysterium.

Let's teleport there. Are you ready to go?

The glyph has just been deciphered.

A method was found to convert the glyph from Vella's body into a gemstone to activate the teleportal.

Activate the teleportal using the gemstone made from the deciphered glyph."How do I activate the teleportal?"

Exposing the gemstone to extreme cold will connect the portal to the destination.

Hoakha has already left for Frost Reach to set up the teleportal.

Go and join him.

So you've found a way to activate the teleportal.

The orb gives the teleportal its power.

You can feel the icy coldness of this place all over your body.

It must be an extremely important secret for the gatekeeper himself to be present.

Let's take out the enemies and keep moving.

There seems to be some kind of special device.

You need to time it right so you can jump when the ice mine explodes and make it out of here.

There are no words to express the grief we feel when a friend dies.

We must remember what the two sisters achieved.

Let us first return to Kaiator and report to Kaia.
You must notify Headquarters of Hasmina's death.
